programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Drama, Family, Romance, Children's ║ 1995 ║ PG
programme.desc: Two lookalike youngsters trade places to help resolve each other's problems. Children's comedy, starring Kirstie Alley, Steve Guttenberg and Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen Andy Tennant - Director Kirstie Alley - Diane Barrows Steve Guttenberg - Roger Callaway Mary-Kate Olsen - Amanda Lemmon Ashley Olsen - Alyssa Callaway Philip Bosco - Vincenzo Jane Sibbett - Clarice Kensington Michelle Grisom - Carmen Desmond Roberts - Frankie Anthony Aiello - Anthony.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Drama, Sci Fi, Action, Fantasy ║ 2015 ║ 12
programme.desc: Sci-fi action comedy starring Adam Sandler and Kevin James. programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Jan 2025

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie
programme.desc: Comedy, inspired by the 1970s TV series, starring Shelley Long and Gary Cole. Los Angeles in 1995: the community is crumbling and the crime rate is spiralling out of control. In the middle of all this, the Brady bunch - mum, dad and six children - live a happy and idyllic existence, caught in a time warp of 1970s values. But the family is in danger of losing the house, so it's up to the kids to pull together and raise the $20,000 needed to save their home Betty Thomas - Director Shelley Long - Carol Brady Gary Cole - Mike Brady Michael McKean - Mr Dittmeyer Christine Taylor - Marcia Brady Christopher Daniel Barnes - Greg Brady Jennifer Elise Cox - Jan Brady Paul Sutera - Peter Brady Olivia Hack - Cindy Brady Jesse Lee - Bobby Brady Henriette Mantel - Alice Jean Smart - Mrs Dittmeyer.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: Police action thriller starring Samuel L Jackson and Colin Farrell. programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Drama, Sci Fi, Action ║ 1999 ║ PG
programme.desc: Sci-fi spoof starring Tim Allen, Sigourney Weaver and Alan Rickman. Almost 20 years after the cancellation of their TV show, the actor crew of the spaceship Protector encounters a strange group of fans at a convention. programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: Comedy starring Rowan Atkinson as the accident-prone Mr Bean. In an attempt to get rid of him from his job as one of their attendants, the governors of the National Gallery send Mr Bean to America to represent them at the unveiling of the Grierson Gallery's new purchase. programme.title: Mr Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Comedy starring Rowan Atkinson. Mr Bean puts the entente cordiale under considerable strain when he wins a camcorder and a trip to France in a raffle. programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Romance, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2002 ║ PG
programme.desc: Fantasy action adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Tobey Maguire, Willem Dafoe and Kirsten Dunst. During a school trip to a New York laboratory, Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically modified spider and develops extraordinary powers. Then a series of events convinces Peter that he should use his new physical abilities to wage war on crime - a decision that takes him away from his school sweetheart, Mary Jane Watson, and pits him against the evil Green Goblin. n Sam Raimi - Director Tobey Maguire - Peter Parker / Spider-Man Willem Dafoe - Green Goblin / Norman Osborn Kirsten Dunst - Mary Jane Watson James Franco - Harry Osborn Cliff Robertson - Ben Parker Rosemary Harris - May Parker J K Simmons - J Jonah Jameson Gerry Becker - Maximilian Fargas Bill Nunn - Joseph \Robbie\ Robertson Jack Betts - Henry Balkan Stanley Anderson - General Slocum Ron Perkins - Dr Mendel Stromm Joe Manganiello - Eugene \Flash\ Thompson Ted Raimi - Hoffman Bruce Campbell - Ring announcer Macy Gray - Macy Gray Lucy Lawless - Punk rock girl Michael Papajohn - The Burglar Randy Poffo - Bone Saw McGraw Stan Lee - Man shielding child.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Tom Cruise, Cuba Gooding Jr and Renée Zellweger. As a top agent at Sports Management International, Jerry Maguire knows his way around and is his own man... until one day he gets an attack of decency and finds himself out of a job. Now he must start from scratch. programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Monster movie starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson. When two giant monsters begin tearing their way from Japan to America, humanity struggles to find a way to stop them. At the 11th hour, the mysterious giant creature known as Godzilla, last seen in the 1950s, emerges to take the pair on. But is he on our side Gareth Edwards - Director Aaron Johnson - Ford Brody Ken Watanabe - Ishiro Serizawa Elizabeth Olsen - Elle Brody Bryan Cranston - Joe Brody Juliette Binoche - Sandra Brody David Strathairn - Admiral Stenz Sally Hawkins - Dr Vivienne Graham Richard T Jones - Captain Russell Hampton Victor Rasuk - Tre Morales Patrick Sabongui - Lieutenant Commander Marcus Waltz C J Adams - Young Ford Brody.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Drama, Action, Sci Fi, Thriller ║ 2024 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Monster action adventure starring Rebecca Hall, Brian Tyree Henry and Dan Stevens. Since the Titans' last confrontation, Kong has decamped underground and is exploring the vast, fantastical world of "Hollow Earth". Meanwhile, Godzilla is up on the Earth's surface, keeping other monsters in check. However, a subterranean distress call initiates events that will see the two old foes face off against each other once again Adam Wingard - Director Rebecca Hall - Ilene Andrews Brian Tyree Henry - Bernie Hayes Dan Stevens - Trapper Kaylee Hottle - Jia Alex Ferns - Michael Fala Chen - Iwi Queen Rachel House - Hampton.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Supernatural adventure starring Paul Rudd, featuring Bill Murray and Dan Aykroyd. The spook-hunting Spengler family joins forces with the original Ghostbusters, whose work is continuing via a secret research lab. When an ancient artefact is discovered and releases an evil force, the team must work together to prevent the dawning of a new Ice Age Gil Kenan - Director Paul Rudd - Gary Grooberson Carrie Coon - Callie Spengler Mckenna Grace - Phoebe Spengler Finn Wolfhard - Trevor Spengler Bill Murray - Peter Venkman Dan Aykroyd - Raymond \Ray\ Stantz Annie Potts - Janine Melnitz Ernie Hudson - Winston Zeddemore William Atherton - Walter Peck.

programme.sub-title: Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action, Horror ║ 2008 ║ 15
programme.desc: Science-fiction action thriller produced by JJ Abrams, creator of TV series Lost. programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: Science-fiction drama starring Amy Adams and Jeremy Renner. programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. After a devastating earthquake flattens buildings as far as the eye can see, Hwang Gung Apartments is the only tower block left standing in Seoul. programme.sub-title: Drama, Animation, Children's, Comedy, Family, Fantasy ║ 2024 ║ U
programme.desc: Santa Claus is excitedly preparing for another busy festive season at the North Pole with his army of helpers, including executive assistant Leo. Action figures of the film character SuperKlaus are especially popular this year, but a blow to the head robs Santa of his memory, and he labours under the illusion that he is SuperKlaus. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. The death of his father and subsequent abdication of his older brother means that "Bertie" is to be crowned king. Unconventional speech therapist Lionel Logue is enlisted to help the future George VI find his voice - and despite Logue's disregard for all things stately, the two men form an unlikely bond Tom Hooper - Director Colin Firth - \Albert\, King George Vl Helena Bonham Carter - Queen Elizabeth Geoffrey Rush - Lionel Logue Guy Pearce - \David\, Edward Vlll Michael Gambon - King George V Timothy Spall - Winston Churchill Jennifer Ehle - Myrtle Logue Derek Jacobi - Archbishop Cosmo Lang Claire Bloom - Queen Mary Anthony Andrews - Stanley Baldwin Tim Downie - Duke of Gloucester Eve Best - Wallis Simpson Freya Wilson - Princess Elizabeth Ramona Marquez - Princess Margaret.

programme.desc: Santa Claus is excitedly preparing for another busy festive season at the North Pole with his army of helpers, including executive assistant Leo. programme.title: US Open '24: Evans v Khachanov
programme.desc: Dan Evans' third-round run at the 2024 US Open began with an epic five-set thriller against Karen Khachanov, who two years prior, appeared in the semi-finals of the New York Slam.

programme.title: US Open '24: Paolini v Andreescu
programme.desc: Jasmine Paolini entered the 2024 US Open a Roland Garros and Wimbledon finalist in the same season, as the Italian got underway in New York against former champion Bianca Andreescu.

programme.title: Venus v Serena 2001
programme.desc: The 2001 US Open women's singles final witnessed the first career Grand Slam final meeting between Venus and Serena Williams. At just 21 and 19 years old, the pair would go on to dominate.

programme.title: Rome 2005: Nadal v Coria
programme.desc: In the 2005 Rome final, Rafael Nadal and Guillermo Coria went back and forth for over five hours in a breathtaking display of raw physicality and determination across five epic sets.

programme.title: Monte Carlo 2006: Nadal v Federer
programme.desc: Rafael Nadal and Roger Federer met in the first of three consecutive Monte-Carlo Masters finals, as the Spaniard overcame the then world number one Federer in four thrilling sets.

programme.title: Connors v Borg 1976
programme.desc: Home favourite Jimmy Connors fought the number two seed Bjorn Borg in the finale to the men's singles at the 1976 US Open. Borg dispatched champion Manuel Orantes en route to the final.

programme.title: Star Maker: The Jimmy Murphy Story
programme.desc: On the 63rd anniversary of Munich we remember one of the greatest coaches in Manchester United history, the man who brought through the Busby Babes and let the club in the aftermath of the tragedy.

programme.title: La Philosophie de Cantona: The Rebel Speaks
programme.desc: An exclusive, extended interview from 2013 with United legend Eric Cantona, presented by French film director and broadcaster Antoine de Caunes.

programme.title: La Philosophie de Cantona: The Art of Rebellion
programme.desc: Over 20 years since signing for United, this documentary examines Cantona's personal philosophies. With exclusive contributions from Eric's family.

programme.desc: Christian Eriksen and Rasmus Hojlund answer questions from MUSC Scandinavia in our exclusive Q&A.

programme.title: PL: Derby v United 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 25/11/00. Sir Alex's side were looking for an eighth straight victory when they took on struggling Derby County.

programme.title: PL: United v Ipswich 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 23/12/00. United faced a dangerous Ipswich side who already had a win at Anfield under the belt earlier in the season.

programme.title: PL: United v Coventry 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 14/4/01. A victory for United could secure the title if results went their way and could all but condemn Coventry to relegation.

programme.title: PL: United v Aston Villa 04/05
programme.desc: United Archives 22/1/05. Following victory at Anfield, the Reds were looking to keep the pressure on the leaders with victory over Aston Villa.

programme.title: PL: United v City 06/07
programme.desc: United Archives 9/12/06. United took on City looking to regain local bragging rights after a 3-1 defeat at the hands of their neighbours in the previous season.

programme.title: PL: Tottenham v United 06/07
programme.desc: United Archives 4/2/07. United took on Spurs looking to regain a six point lead at the top of the Premiership after Chelsea had cut the gap the previous evening.

programme.title: PL: United v Aston Villa 07/08
programme.desc: United Archives 28/3/08. With seven games remaining, United welcomed Aston Villa to Old Trafford looking for more precious points.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 10/11
programme.desc: United Archives 16/8/10. Javier Hernandez made his United debut in this season opener, as the Reds faced newly-promoted Newcastle.

programme.title: PL: Stoke City v United 10/11
programme.desc: United Archives 24/10/10. A double from Javier Hernandez secures a vital win for the Reds against tough-tackling Stoke City.

programme.title: PL: United v Tottenham 10/11
programme.desc: United Archives 30/10/10. A controversial goal from Nani made sure of the points as United kept the pressure on Chelsea at the top of the table¿.

programme.title: PL: United v Arsenal 10/11
programme.desc: United Archives 13/12/10. United face a test as league leaders Arsenal visit Old Trafford. Ji-Sung Park has a habit of scoring in big games against The Gunners so would he make a difference again?

programme.title: PL: Blackpool v United 10/11
programme.desc: United Archives 25/1/11. Dimitar Berbatov inspires a classic comeback to take The Reds five clear in the title race.

programme.title: PL: Liverpool v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 23/9/12. Always a special fixture, Sir Alex's side went to Anfield in search of their first win at the home of their fierce rivals since 2007.

programme.title: PL: United v Arsenal 05/06
programme.desc: United Archives 9/4/06. Always a big game when these teams meet. United were hoping to keep the pressure on Chelsea at the top of the league.

programme.title: PL: United v Crystal Palace 04/05
programme.desc: United Archives 18/12/04. United open their festive fixture list with the visit of Iain Dowie's Crystal Palace to Old Trafford.

programme.title: PL: Leeds v United 01/02
programme.desc: United Archives 30/3/02. Ole Gunnar Solskjaer inspired United to a vital win over Premiership rivals Leeds in a seven-goal thriller at Elland Road.
